DarkMouse::

She stood perfectly still and watched from behind a large tree at 
this bot who was calling her out. How did he know my name, she 
thought.  She did scan and noticed his weapons were down. If he was a 
decepticon of sorts, he was either very smart, or very stupid. No one 
ever lowered weapons unless something is to be gained. But was was to 
be gained by her coming forth? Was he after her energon?  She decided 
to walk out slowly towards him, but stayed near the trees incase she 
needed cover in a hurry. She kept her pistol on him. "WHo are you?" 
Do I know you?"
Her logic circuits told her that she knew him, but she couldn't 
recall from were. She wasn't sure if he was friend or foe.  She kept 
her distance, but wanted to understand what was going on. "I am 
DarkMouse. Who are you?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Galvatron stopped. He thought....ah what the hell. He blasted off 
and landed 
> near where he could still sence her signature. he went into his 
robot mode 
> less intimidateing then a big silver dragon and put a smile on his 
face. 
> "Hello Darkmouse. Please come out where I can see you. MY weapons 
are down 
> scan for yourself." They actualy were he knew that was the only way 
she'd 
> come out.
